readable.title: 2167644298_100ca79f54
readable.content: A man dressed in black wearing a hat and glasses in front of a red wall . A man in a black hat stands in front of a red wall . A man wearing all black and a black hat is smiling . A man with a hat , glasses , jewelry and a jacket stands against an orange wall . There is a man with glasses and a hat wearing a black suit jacket indoors .
